features: ✅【Keep Your Home Tidy】This beautiful Besilord silverware organizer has 5 pcs deep compartments and can be placed into any drawer or desktop, which helps you to see everything at a glance and keep away from messy. The perfect space-saving utensil organizer helps you to reach the desired item that you are looking for. Whether you are looking for your favorite knife or spoon, this kitchen drawer organizer makes it completely simple and easy. We highly recommend to measure your drawer before order.

✅【Sturdy and Well-made】Our silverware tray for drawer is made of natural bamboo with the age of over 4 years, which makes the silverware organizer durable enough for long time use. The Environmentally material keep our flatware & utensil water and odor resistant. Even the knife won't leave scratch on it. Unlike the plastic and metal drawer organizer, our silverware tray more classic and natural, the color and texture of the kitchen drawer organizer is 100% natural and even.

✅【Soild Construction】Our kitchen drawer organizer is half manual made, more strong, more delicate. Mortise and tenon structure makes this utensil organizer hold up well. Sturdy dividers and base won’t warp. Excellent craftsmanship and strict quality-strict ensure each drawer dividers is touched with the board tightly, so your kitchen silverware won’t get stuck. The bottom is equipped with premium non-slip pads to keep your organizer in place. Kitchen storage just got a whole lot easier.

✅【Multifunctional Management】Our multi-purpose cutlery organizer is not only suitable for storing silverware, but also suitable for storing disposable tableware, sundries, cosmetics, hair accessories, repair tools, art sets, stationery. With this silverware organizer for drawer, drawers in the kitchen, bathroom, dresser, room, office can be efficiently organized. This is the best home gifts, everyone would like to have such practical gifts for drawer organizer home.

✅【100% Customer Satisfaction】Here at Besilord we produce high-quality products that upgrade the quality of life while also providing immaculate customer support. We take the shopping experience of our customers very seriously. We are here for you 24/7 for any questions you may have. Besilord provides professional customer service before and after purchase. What you can get are high quality bamboo utensil organizer for kitchen drawers and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERFECT KITCHEN SILVERWARE ORGANIZER The 5 slots bamboo drawer organizer is undoubtedly the master of space. Fits most drawers and can handle many different sized utensils, this utensil drawer organizer will fit like a custom, maximize your available storage space. The perfect space-saving silverware tray helps you to reach the desired item that you are looking for. Whether you are looking for your favorite knife or a spoon, this perfect cutlery organizer in drawer makes it completely simple and easy.

NO CLUTTERED DRAWER ANYMORE Great news for anyone struggling with a cluttered kitchen! Our silverware organizer is designed to keep your silverware neat and tidy. Whether you are looking for your favorite knife or a spoon, this perfect tray organizer makes it completely simple and easy. Say goodbye to mess and hello to a clean, organized kitchen. Get your silverware tray today and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing everything is in its place.

EASY TO CLEAN：Thanks to the bamboo structure, stains are hard to remain on our silverware organizer. Simply apply a warm damp cloth and wipe it down of any stains. With about 5 minutes every week, you can keep your cutlery organizer looking brand new! Hand washing is recommended. SOLID AND DURABLE：The silverware organizer is sturdy enough to store in place. The tenon joint design assures it hold up well. NATURAL MATERIAL：The Environmentally material keep our kitchen drawer organizer water and odor resistant. Even the knife won't leave scratch on it.

MULTIPURPOSE APPLICATIONS The cutlery organizer in drawer features deep space compartments that are large enough to store all types of items. One can swiftly declutter messy and unorganized drawers within a few seconds. Now organize your silverware, flatware, cutlery, utensils, kitchen gadgets, workstation and office supplies, stationery, electrical devices, garage tools, jewelry items, and makeup accessories. It is also used for storing and arranging children’s toys and accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits in the drawer and holds more than just my silverware
reviews.reviewText: Fits the drawers perfect, holds more than just my silverware and it looks great. Sturdy, well made. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is it!
reviews.reviewText: Helping me with my goal of getting organized! Looks terrific in my drawer, big enough for my utensils, and well made. I like it so much that as soon as I got it, I ordered another one for another drawer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a gift for my kids first apartment. Matches their industrial vibe, fits nicely in the drawer. Well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome silverware organizer!
reviews.reviewText: This silverware organizer is fantastic. I love bamboo items and I was thrilled that the quality was exactly as I expected it to be. The amount of space for each item is great and it fits perfectly in a standard size kitchen drawer. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sturdy silverware tray
reviews.reviewText: Good way to keep your silverware organized. I especially like how it matches the med oak cabinets I have. The compartments are really big for what I would consider "normal" tableware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sophisticated Flatware Drawer
reviews.reviewText: Went from plastic to sophisticated. Love the look when opening the flatware drawer. Choose the 7 compartments, where our daily used flatware is next to each other, and enough space for our long yogurt spoons. The material is fitting, sturdy, and simply perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised. Works well, expands, and fit all my silverware.
